sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_dbb276c8db2fe7007193f7b31d9619e2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_swre_auto_ico_sport</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_swre_auto_ico_sport">u_reference_id_sportVALCHANGES^ORstateCHANGESTO7^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_reference_id_sport" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="true" value="7"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Assign/Unassign Deployment Package</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Assign deployment packages for Automated task based on Release ID and Unassign deployment package when state changes to closed skipped or Release ID changes (Sport).
 *
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Amit Gujarathi  [S4AXNZ]
 * @requires global.module:sys_script_include.SRDeploymentPackage
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var previousPackage = previous.getValue('u_reference_id_sport');
    var currentPackage = current.getValue('u_reference_id_sport');

    var taskSysId = current.getValue('sys_id');

    if (current.state.changesTo(7)) {
        // Unassign package from Task if the state is Closed cancled( State==7)
        new SRDeploymentPackage().unAssignFromTask(taskSysId, currentPackage);
    } else {

        //Unassign package from Task
        if (!gs.nil(previousPackage)) {
            new SRDeploymentPackage().unAssignFromTask(taskSysId, previousPackage);
        }

        //Assign package to Task
        if (!gs.nil(currentPackage)) {
            new SRDeploymentPackage().assignToTask(taskSysId, currentPackage);
        }

    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S7DHWK</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-06 07:21:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>dbb276c8db2fe7007193f7b31d9619e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Assign/Unassign Deployment Package</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_dbb276c8db2fe7007193f7b31d9619e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-12 09:03:55</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=dbb276c8db2fe7007193f7b31d9619e2"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>dbb276c8db2fe7007193f7b31d9619e2</documentkey><fieldname>message</fieldname><language>NUL</language><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-11 06:35:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>afc5e47adbccbb007193f7b31d961945</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-11 06:35:46</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_script</tablename><value/></sys_translated_text></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_71edcef0dbeb6b007193f7b31d961937
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_task">planned_start_dateVALCHANGES^planned_start_dateISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="planned_start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="planned_start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Autopopulate expected start date</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/*
 * Autofill "Expected start" in auto task  when change task moves to "Inprogress"
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Dhanalakshmi K [S4GRV8]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */

(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var plannedStartDate = new GlideDateTime(current.planned_start_date);
    var autoTaskObj = new GlideRecord("x_swre_auto_task");
    autoTaskObj.addQuery("parent", current.getValue("sys_id"));
    autoTaskObj.addNotNullQuery("parent");
    autoTaskObj.query();
    while (autoTaskObj.next()) {
        var automatedTask = new SRAutomatedTask(autoTaskObj);
        automatedTask.updateExpectedStartDate(plannedStartDate);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S4GRV8</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-08 12:45:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>71edcef0dbeb6b007193f7b31d961937</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Autopopulate expected start date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_71edcef0dbeb6b007193f7b31d961937</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-14 10:56:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=71edcef0dbeb6b007193f7b31d961937"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_relationship_4d195a09db1cb3407193f7b31d9619cb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>change_task</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>x_swre_auto_task</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Redeploy Tasks</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {

	// Add your code here, such as current.addQuery(field, value);
	var redeployChangeTasksArr = (function () {
		var out = [];
		var grChangeTask = new GlideRecord('change_task');
		grChangeTask.addQuery('created_from', 'workflow_' + parent.getValue('number'));
		grChangeTask.query();
		while (grChangeTask.next()) {
			out.push(grChangeTask.getValue('sys_id'));
		}
		return out;
	})();
	
	current.addEncodedQuery('parentIN' + redeployChangeTasksArr.join());

})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field>assigned_to</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S7DHWK</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-18 14:47:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>4d195a09db1cb3407193f7b31d9619cb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Redeploy Tasks</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_4d195a09db1cb3407193f7b31d9619cb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S7DHWK</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-18 15:22:29</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4d195a09db1cb3407193f7b31d9619cb"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>4d195a09db1cb3407193f7b31d9619cb</documentkey><fieldname>name</fieldname><language>NUL</language><sys_created_by>S7DHWK</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-18 14:47:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>b9799609db1cb3407193f7b31d9619ec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>S7DHWK</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-18 14:47:25</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_relationship</tablename><value>Redeploy Tasks</value></sys_translated_text></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_swre_auto_ico_ebm</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_swre_auto_ico_ebm">u_ico_ebm_reference_idVALCHANGES^ORstate=7^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_ico_ebm_reference_id" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="true" value="7"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Assign/Unassign Deployment Package</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Assign deployment packages for Automated task based on Release IDs and Unassign deployment package when state changes to closed skipped or Release IDs changes (EBM Toolkit)
 *
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Amit Gujarathi [S4AXNZ]
 * @requires global.module:sys_script_include.SRDeploymentPackage
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var previousPackages = (function () {
        var pkgs = previous.getValue('u_ico_ebm_reference_id');
        if (gs.nil(pkgs)) {
            return [];
        } else {
            return pkgs.toString().split(',');
        }
    })();

    var currentPackages = (function () {
        var pkgs = current.getValue('u_ico_ebm_reference_id');
        if (gs.nil(pkgs)) {
            return [];
        } else {
            return pkgs.toString().split(',');
        }
    })();

    var taskSysId = current.getValue('sys_id');
    gs.debug("previous: {0} \current: {1}", [previousPackages.toString(), currentPackages.toString()]);
    //Get an array of added packages
    var addedPackages = currentPackages.filter(function (elm) {
        return (previousPackages.indexOf(elm) === -1);
    });

    //Get an array of removed packages
    var removedPackages = previousPackages.filter(function (elm) {
        return (currentPackages.indexOf(elm) === -1);
    });
    gs.debug("added: {0} \nremoved: {1}", [addedPackages.toString(), removedPackages.toString()]);

    if (current.state.changesTo(7)) {
        // Unassign package from Task if the state is Closed cancled( State==7)
        currentPackages.forEach(function (elm) {
            new SRDeploymentPackage().unAssignFromTask(taskSysId, elm);
        });

    } else {
        //Assign package to Task
        addedPackages.forEach(function (elm) {
            new SRDeploymentPackage().assignToTask(taskSysId, elm);
        });

        //Unassign package from Task
        removedPackages.forEach(function (elm) {
            new SRDeploymentPackage().unAssignFromTask(taskSysId, elm);
        });
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-28 10:38:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0f59cbb3dbe1b3407193f7b31d96196a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Assign/Unassign Deployment Package</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0f59cbb3dbe1b3407193f7b31d96196a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-29 11:39:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0f59cbb3dbe1b3407193f7b31d96196a"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>0f59cbb3dbe1b3407193f7b31d96196a</documentkey><fieldname>message</fieldname><language>NUL</language><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-28 10:38:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>8b59cbb3dbe1b3407193f7b31d96196c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-28 10:38:28</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_script</tablename><value/></sys_translated_text></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a14dd6c8dbebe7007193f7b31d9619f2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_swre_auto.SRDeploymentPackage</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SRDeploymentPackage</name><script><![CDATA[var SRDeploymentPackage = Class.create();
SRDeploymentPackage.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	assignToTask: function (taskSysId, packageSysId) {
		var packageRec = new GlideRecord('x_swre_auto_dep_pkg');
		if (packageRec.get(packageSysId)) {
			packageRec.u_related_task = taskSysId;
			packageRec.update();
			gs.info('Package [{0}] assigned to Task [{1}]', [packageSysId, taskSysId]);
		}
	},
	
	unAssignFromTask: function (taskSysId, packageSysId) {
		var packageRec = new GlideRecord('x_swre_auto_dep_pkg');
		if (packageRec.get(packageSysId)) {
			packageRec.u_related_task = '';
			packageRec.update();
			gs.info('Package [{0}] unassigned from Task [{1}]', [packageSysId, taskSysId]);
		}
	},

    type: 'SRDeploymentPackage'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S7DHWK</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-06 05:55:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>a14dd6c8dbebe7007193f7b31d9619f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SRDeploymentPackage</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a14dd6c8dbebe7007193f7b31d9619f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S7DHWK</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-06 05:57:02</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_swre_auto_ico_scm_host</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_swre_auto_ico_scm_host">u_ico_scm_reference_idVALCHANGES^ORstateCHANGESTO7^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_ico_scm_reference_id" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="true" value="7"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Assign/Unassign Deployment Package</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Assign deployment packages for Automated task based on Release IDs and Unassign deployment package when state changes to closed skipped or Release IDs changes (SCM Host)
 *
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Amit Gujarathi [S4AXNZ]
 * @requires global.module:sys_script_include.SRDeploymentPackage
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

	// Add your code here
	var previousPackages = (function () {
		var pkgs = previous.getValue('u_ico_scm_reference_id');
		if (gs.nil(pkgs)) {
			return [];
		} else {
			return pkgs.toString().split(',');
		}
	})();

	var currentPackages = (function () {
		var pkgs = current.getValue('u_ico_scm_reference_id');
		if (gs.nil(pkgs)) {
			return [];
		} else {
			return pkgs.toString().split(',');
		}
	})();

	var taskSysId = current.getValue('sys_id');
	gs.debug("previous: {0} \current: {1}", [previousPackages.toString(), currentPackages.toString()]);
	//Get an array of added packages
	var addedPackages = currentPackages.filter(function (elm) {
		return (previousPackages.indexOf(elm) === -1);
	});

	//Get an array of removed packages
	var removedPackages = previousPackages.filter(function (elm) {
		return (currentPackages.indexOf(elm) === -1);
	});
	gs.debug("added: {0} \nremoved: {1}", [addedPackages.toString(), removedPackages.toString()]);

	if (current.state.changesTo(7)) {
		// Unassign package from Task if the state is Closed cancled( State==7)
		currentPackages.forEach(function (elm) {
			new SRDeploymentPackage().unAssignFromTask(taskSysId, elm);
		});

	} else {
		//Assign package to Task
		addedPackages.forEach(function (elm) {
			new SRDeploymentPackage().assignToTask(taskSysId, elm);
		});

		//Unassign package from Task
		removedPackages.forEach(function (elm) {
			new SRDeploymentPackage().unAssignFromTask(taskSysId, elm);
		});
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-28 06:32:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>653f0e73db21b3407193f7b31d9619c7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Assign/Unassign Deployment Package</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_653f0e73db21b3407193f7b31d9619c7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-28 06:32:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=653f0e73db21b3407193f7b31d9619c7"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>653f0e73db21b3407193f7b31d9619c7</documentkey><fieldname>message</fieldname><language>NUL</language><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-28 06:32:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>a71192b3db21b3407193f7b31d961977</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-28 06:32:44</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_script</tablename><value/></sys_translated_text></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7b93c4a0dbb967005a31fd161d96195e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_swre_auto.SRAutomatedTask</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SRAutomatedTask</name><script><![CDATA[var SRAutomatedTask = Class.create();
SRAutomatedTask.prototype = {

	BASE_TABLE_NAME : 'x_swre_auto_task',

	initialize: function(current) {
		var self = this;

		if (!gs.nil(current)) {
			this.setAutoTaskObject(current);
		}

		self.stateMap = {
			"PENDING": -5,
			"OPEN": 1,
			"WORK_IN_PROGRESS": 2,
			"CLOSED_COMPLETE": 3,
			"CLOSED_INCOMPLETE": 4,
			"CLOSED_SKIPPED": 7
		};

		self.validStates = [-5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 7];

	},

	setAutoTaskObject: function(obj) {
		
		this.autoTaskClassName = obj.getRecordClassName();
		
		this.recordTableName = obj.getTableName();

		this.autoTaskObj = (function (className, tableName, baseTableName, passedInObject) {
			if (tableName == baseTableName) {
				
				var grAutoTask = new GlideRecord(className);
				if (grAutoTask.get(passedInObject.getValue('sys_id'))) {
					return grAutoTask;
				}
			}
			
			return passedInObject;
		})(this.autoTaskClassName, this.recordTableName, this.BASE_TABLE_NAME, obj);

	},

	setAutoTaskTableName: function(tableName) {
		this.TABLE_NAME = gs.nil(tableName) ? "" : tableName;
	},

	createAutomatedTask: function(tableName, fieldsArrayMap) {
		if (gs.nil(tableName) && gs.nil(this.TABLE_NAME)) {
			throw 'Error in SRAutomatedTask().createAutomatedTask. Table name not specified';
		}

		if (gs.nil(fieldsArrayMap) || typeof fieldsArrayMap != 'object') {
			throw 'Error in SRAutomatedTask().createAutomatedTask. Invalid fieldsArrayMap passed.';
		}

		this.TABLE_NAME = gs.nil(tableName) ? this.TABLE_NAME : tableName;

		var autoTaskGr = new GlideRecord(this.TABLE_NAME);
		autoTaskGr.initialize();
		fieldsArrayMap.forEach(function (fieldObj) {
			autoTaskGr[fieldObj.fieldName] = fieldObj.fieldValue;
		});
		autoTaskGr.insert();

		var err = autoTaskGr.getLastErrorMessage();
		if (!gs.nil(err)) {
			throw 'Error in SRAutomatedTask().createAutomatedTask. \n' + err;
		} else {
			return autoTaskGr.getValue('sys_id');
		}

	},

	isActive: function() {
		return this.autoTaskObj.active;
	},

	updateWorkNotes: function(workNotes) {
		var autoTaskObj = this.autoTaskObj;
		autoTaskObj.work_notes = workNotes;
		autoTaskObj.update();
	},

	updateExpectedStartDate: function (plannedStartDate) {
		if (gs.nil(plannedStartDate)) {
			return '';
		}
		var autoTaskObj = this.autoTaskObj;
		autoTaskObj.expected_start = plannedStartDate;
		autoTaskObj.update();
	},

	moveToPending: function(workNotes) {
		return this._updateState (this.stateMap['PENDING'], workNotes);
	},

	moveToOpen: function(workNotes) {
		return this._updateState (this.stateMap['OPEN'], workNotes);
	},

	moveToInProgress: function(workNotes) {
		return this._updateState (this.stateMap['WORK_IN_PROGRESS'], workNotes);
	},

	moveToClosedComplete: function(workNotes) {
		return this._updateState (this.stateMap['CLOSED_COMPLETE'], workNotes);
	},

	moveToClosedIncomplete: function(workNotes) {
		return this._updateState (this.stateMap['CLOSED_INCOMPLETE'], workNotes);
	},

	moveToClosedSkipped: function(workNotes) {
		return this._updateState (this.stateMap['CLOSED_SKIPPED'], workNotes);
	},

	_updateState: function(newState, message) {
		var self = this;
		var stateMap = self.stateMap;
		var autoTaskObj = self.autoTaskObj;
		var validStates = self.validStates;

		var result = {
			'updateSuccessful': false,
			'additionalMessage': ''
		};

		if (gs.nil(newState)) {
			result.updateSuccessful = false;
			result.additionalMessage = 'newState cannot be null';
			return result;
		}

		if (validStates.indexOf(newState) === -1) {
			result.updateSuccessful = false;
			result.additionalMessage = 'Error updating state. Invalid state value: ' + newState;
			return result;
		}

		autoTaskObj.setValue('state', newState);
		if (!gs.nil(message)) {
			autoTaskObj.work_notes = message;
		}
		autoTaskObj.update();

		result.updateSuccessful = true;
		result.additionalMessage = 'Successfully updated the state for Automated Task: ' + autoTaskObj.getValue('number');
		return result;
	},

	getValidFlag: function () {

		var configRecord = new SRAutomationConfig().getConfiguration(this.autoTaskClassName);
		
		if (configRecord != '') {
			
			if (configRecord.u_enable_valid_check) {
				var validityScriptResult = (function (autoTaskObj) {
					var scriptParams = {
						'autoTaskObj': autoTaskObj
					};
					
					var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
					return evaluator.evaluateScript(configRecord, 'u_validity_check_script', scriptParams);
				})(this.autoTaskObj);

				return gs.nil(validityScriptResult) ? true : validityScriptResult;
			}
		}
		// By default, return true
		return true;
	},

	type: 'SRAutomatedTask'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S7DHWK</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-12 08:03:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>7b93c4a0dbb967005a31fd161d96195e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>40</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SRAutomatedTask</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7b93c4a0dbb967005a31fd161d96195e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S7DHWK</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-25 10:35:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_ff02e6ebdb3d6f005a31fd161d9619a8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_swre_auto.SRAutomationConfig</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SRAutomationConfig</name><script><![CDATA[var SRAutomationConfig = Class.create();
SRAutomationConfig.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
		this.CONFIG_TABLE_NAME = 'x_swre_auto_config';
	},

	getConfiguration: function(autoTableName) {
		var configRecord = new GlideRecord(this.CONFIG_TABLE_NAME);
		configRecord.addQuery('u_active', true);
		configRecord.addQuery('u_table', autoTableName);
		configRecord.query();
		if (configRecord.next()) {
			return configRecord;
		} else {
			return '';
		}
	},

	getActiveConfigurations: function() {
		var result = [];
		var configRecord = new GlideRecord(this.CONFIG_TABLE_NAME);
		configRecord.addQuery('u_active', true);
		configRecord.query();
		while (configRecord.next()) {
			result.push({
				'sys_id': configRecord.getValue('sys_id'),
				'table_name': configRecord.getValue('u_table'),
				'table_label': ''
			});
		}
		return result;
	},

	isValidityCheckEnabled: function (autoTableName) {
		var configRecord = new GlideRecord(this.CONFIG_TABLE_NAME);
		configRecord.addQuery('u_active', true);
		configRecord.addQuery('u_table', autoTableName);
		configRecord.query();
		if (configRecord.next()) {
			return configRecord.u_enable_valid_check ? true : false;
		} else {
			return false;
		}
	},

	type: 'SRAutomationConfig'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S7DHWK</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-22 03:34:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>ff02e6ebdb3d6f005a31fd161d9619a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SRAutomationConfig</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ff02e6ebdb3d6f005a31fd161d9619a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S7DHWK</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-25 10:01:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_1e808530dbb5a7005a31fd161d9619bd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_swre_auto.SRAutomation</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SRAutomation</name><script><![CDATA[var SRAutomation = Class.create();
SRAutomation.prototype = {
	initialize: function(autoTaskObj) {
		var self = this;
		
		self.recordClass = autoTaskObj.getRecordClassName();
		self.tableName = autoTaskObj.getTableName();
		
		self.autoTaskObj = (function () {
			if (self.recordClass == self.tableName) {
				return autoTaskObj;
			} else {
				var grChild = new GlideRecord(self.recordClass);
				if (grChild.get(autoTaskObj.getValue('sys_id'))) {
					return grChild;
				} else {
					return autoTaskObj;
				}
			}
		})();
		
	},
	
	execute: function() {
		
		var configRecord = new SRAutomationConfig().getConfiguration(this.recordClass);

		if (configRecord != '') {
			var processingScriptResult = (function (autoTaskObj) {
				var scriptParams = {
					'autoTaskObj': autoTaskObj
				};
				
				var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
				return evaluator.evaluateScript(configRecord, 'u_processing_script', scriptParams);
			})(this.autoTaskObj);
			
			return processingScriptResult;
		} else {
			gs.error('Configuration record not found for table: ' + this.tableName);
			return 'Configuration record not found for table: ' + this.tableName;
		}
		
	},
	
	type: 'SRAutomation'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S7DHWK</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-13 07:27:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>1e808530dbb5a7005a31fd161d9619bd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SRAutomation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1e808530dbb5a7005a31fd161d9619bd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S7DHWK</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-06 07:30:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_88a0aa4cdbebe7007193f7b31d96195a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_swre_auto_ico_bamboo</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_swre_auto_ico_bamboo">u_release_id_bambooVALCHANGES^ORstateCHANGESTO7^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_release_id_bamboo" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="true" value="7"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Assign/Unassign Deployment Package</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Assign deployment packages for Automated task based on Release IDs and Unassign deployment package when state changes to closed skipped or Release IDs changes (Bamboo)
 *
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Amit Gujarathi [S4AXNZ]
 * @requires global.module:sys_script_include.SRDeploymentPackage
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var previousPackages = (function () {
        var pkgs = previous.getValue('u_release_id_bamboo');
        if (gs.nil(pkgs)) {
            return [];
        } else {
            return pkgs.toString().split(',');
        }
    })();

    var currentPackages = (function () {
        var pkgs = current.getValue('u_release_id_bamboo');
        if (gs.nil(pkgs)) {
            return [];
        } else {
            return pkgs.toString().split(',');
        }
    })();

    var taskSysId = current.getValue('sys_id');
    gs.debug("previous: {0} \current: {1}", [previousPackages.toString(), currentPackages.toString()]);
    //Get an array of added packages
    var addedPackages = currentPackages.filter(function (elm) {
        return (previousPackages.indexOf(elm) === -1);
    });

    //Get an array of removed packages
    var removedPackages = previousPackages.filter(function (elm) {
        return (currentPackages.indexOf(elm) === -1);
    });
    gs.debug("added: {0} \nremoved: {1}", [addedPackages.toString(), removedPackages.toString()]);

    if (current.state.changesTo(7)) {
        // Unassign package from Task if the state is Closed cancled( State==7)
        currentPackages.forEach(function (elm) {
            new SRDeploymentPackage().unAssignFromTask(taskSysId, elm);
        });

    } else {
        //Assign package to Task
        addedPackages.forEach(function (elm) {
            new SRDeploymentPackage().assignToTask(taskSysId, elm);
        });

        //Unassign package from Task
        removedPackages.forEach(function (elm) {
            new SRDeploymentPackage().unAssignFromTask(taskSysId, elm);
        });
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S7DHWK</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-06 06:15:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>88a0aa4cdbebe7007193f7b31d96195a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Assign/Unassign Deployment Package</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_88a0aa4cdbebe7007193f7b31d96195a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-12 09:03:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=88a0aa4cdbebe7007193f7b31d96195a"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>88a0aa4cdbebe7007193f7b31d96195a</documentkey><fieldname>message</fieldname><language>NUL</language><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-11 06:34:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>cb85a43adbccbb007193f7b31d9619fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-11 06:34:39</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_script</tablename><value/></sys_translated_text></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_e6110ccedb8ae7007193f7b31d9619ac
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_swre_auto_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_swre_auto_task">stateCHANGESTO7^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="7"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Cancel Automated task workflow</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * If  state changes to closed skipped (7), cancel related workflows so we don't keep tasks active
 * 
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {


    //get workflow helper
    var workflow = new global.Workflow();
    //cancel all my workflows
    var numCnxd = workflow.cancel(current);
    if (numCnxd > 1)
        gs.addInfoMessage(numCnxd + " " + gs.getMessage("Workflows for {0} have been cancelled", current.getDisplayValue()));
    else if (numCnxd == 1)
        gs.addInfoMessage("1 " + gs.getMessage("Workflow for {0} has been cancelled", current.getDisplayValue()));


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-29 09:59:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e6110ccedb8ae7007193f7b31d9619ac</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Cancel Automated task workflow</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e6110ccedb8ae7007193f7b31d9619ac</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S02W42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-29 10:51:00</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e6110ccedb8ae7007193f7b31d9619ac"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_list_control_cf086ce8dbf967005a31fd161d961951
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_ui_list_control"><sys_ui_list_control action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><columns_condition/><edit_condition/><edit_default_filter/><edit_roles/><empty_condition/><filter_condition/><filter_roles/><hierarchical_lists>false</hierarchical_lists><label/><link_condition/><link_roles/><list_edit_insert_row>false</list_edit_insert_row><list_edit_ref_qual_tag/><list_edit_type>disabled</list_edit_type><name>change_task</name><new_condition><![CDATA[answer = (function () {
    var validTaskTypes = ['testing_automated', 'implementation_automated'];
    var changeTaskType = parent.getValue('change_task_type');
    //Hide New button if change task type is not valid or CTask in inactive
    if (validTaskTypes.indexOf(changeTaskType) === -1 || parent.active == false) {
        return true;
    }

    //Get the count of related Automated Tasks
    var autoTaskCount = (function () {
        var autoTask = new GlideAggregate('x_swre_auto_task');
        autoTask.addQuery('parent', parent.getValue('sys_id'));
        autoTask.addAggregate('COUNT');
        autoTask.query();
        if (autoTask.next()) {
            return autoTask.getAggregate('COUNT');
        } else {
            return 0;
        }
    })();

    //Hide the New button if there is already a Automated Task related to this Change task
    if (autoTaskCount > 0) {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }

})();]]></new_condition><new_roles/><omit_columns_if_empty>false</omit_columns_if_empty><omit_drilldown_link>false</omit_drilldown_link><omit_edit_button>true</omit_edit_button><omit_filters>false</omit_filters><omit_if_empty>false</omit_if_empty><omit_links>false</omit_links><omit_new_button>false</omit_new_button><related_list>x_swre_auto_task.parent</related_list><sys_class_name>sys_ui_list_control</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S7DHWK</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-12 10:39:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cf086ce8dbf967005a31fd161d961951</sys_id><sys_mod_count>37</sys_mod_count><sys_name>change_task</sys_name><sys_overrides display_value="">global</sys_overrides><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_list_control_cf086ce8dbf967005a31fd161d961951</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-14 11:47:50</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_list_control></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_8048ac0edb0ee7007193f7b31d961996
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_task">stateCHANGESTO4^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="4"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Close skip automated tasks</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Change auto task state to close skipped when change task canceled
 * 
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */

(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	
	var autoTaskObj = new GlideRecord("x_swre_auto_task");
	autoTaskObj.addQuery("parent", current.getValue("sys_id"));
	autoTaskObj.addNotNullQuery("parent");
	autoTaskObj.query();
	while (autoTaskObj.next()) {
		var automatedTask = new SRAutomatedTask(autoTaskObj);
		automatedTask.moveToClosedSkipped("Auto task close skipped due to "+current.getValue("number")+" cancelled");
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-29 12:46:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8048ac0edb0ee7007193f7b31d961996</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Close skip automated tasks</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8048ac0edb0ee7007193f7b31d961996</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S02W42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-12-06 06:43:13</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8048ac0edb0ee7007193f7b31d961996"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_swre_auto_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_swre_auto_task">parentISNOTEMPTY^parent.sys_class_name=change_task^EQ<item endquery="false" field="parent" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="parent.sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="change_task"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Display business rule</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Populate change task values on Auto task
 * 
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
	
    if (current.isNewRecord()) {
		var taskStartDate = current.parent.getRefRecord().getValue('planned_start_date');
        current.setValue("expected_start", taskStartDate);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-12-06 06:31:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1e859784db1263005a31fd161d96196f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Display business rule</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1e859784db1263005a31fd161d96196f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S02W42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-12-06 08:12:54</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1e859784db1263005a31fd161d96196f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e4423b58db7967005a31fd161d961910
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_swre_auto.SRAutomatedTaskInbound</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SRAutomatedTaskInbound</name><script><![CDATA[var SRAutomatedTaskInbound = Class.create();
SRAutomatedTaskInbound.prototype = {
    initialize: function (request, response) {
		var self = this;

        self.request = request;
        self.response = response;
    },
	
	updateWorkNotes: function () {
		var self = this,
			workNotes,
			out = {
				'result': 'ok',
				'id': ''
			};
		
		
		var autoTaskId = self.getPathParam('id');
		
		var requestBody = self.request.body;
        if (!requestBody || !requestBody.hasNext())
            return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('initialize: no body found');
		
		var body = requestBody.nextEntry();
        workNotes = body.workNotes || null;
		if (gs.nil(workNotes))
            return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('initialize: workNotes property not found');
		
		var qry = (function () {
			return 'number=' + autoTaskId + '^ORsys_id=' + autoTaskId;
		})();
		
		var autoTaskGr = new GlideRecord('x_swre_auto_task');
		autoTaskGr.addEncodedQuery(qry);
		autoTaskGr.query();
		if (autoTaskGr.next()) {
			//autoTaskGr.work_notes = workNotes;
			//autoTaskGr.update();
			new SRAutomatedTask(autoTaskGr).updateWorkNotes(workNotes);
			out.id = autoTaskGr.getValue('sys_id');
			out.number = autoTaskGr.getValue('number');
			out.state = autoTaskGr.getDisplayValue('state');
			out.result = 'ok';
			return out;
			
		} else {
			return new sn_ws_err.NotFoundError('Could not find Automated Task with id:' + autoTaskId);
		}
				
	},
	
	closeAutomationTask: function () {
		var self = this,
			out = {
				'result': 'ok',
				'id': ''
			},
			jobStatus,
			jobMessage,
			updateStateResultJson;
		
		var validJobStates = [
			"COMPLETE",
			"ERROR"
		];
				
		var autoTaskId = self.getPathParam('id');
		
		var requestBody = self.request.body;
        if (!requestBody || !requestBody.hasNext())
            return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('initialize: no body found');
		
		var body = requestBody.nextEntry();
		
        jobStatus = body.status || null;
		if (gs.nil(jobStatus))
            return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('initialize: status property not found');
		
		jobMessage = body.message || null;
		if (gs.nil(jobMessage))
            return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('initialize: message property not found');
		
		var qry = (function () {
			return 'number=' + autoTaskId + '^ORsys_id=' + autoTaskId;
		})();
		
		if (validJobStates.indexOf(jobStatus) == -1) {
			return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('Invalid status value: ' + jobStatus);
		}
				
		var autoTaskGr = new GlideRecord('x_swre_auto_task');
		autoTaskGr.addEncodedQuery(qry);
		autoTaskGr.query();
		if (autoTaskGr.next()) {
			
			if (jobStatus == 'COMPLETE') {
				updateStateResultJson = new SRAutomatedTask(autoTaskGr).moveToClosedComplete(jobMessage);
			} else if (jobStatus == 'ERROR') {
				updateStateResultJson = new SRAutomatedTask(autoTaskGr).moveToClosedIncomplete(jobMessage);
			}
			
			if (updateStateResultJson.updateSuccessful == false) {
				return new sn_ws_err.NotAcceptableError(updateStateResultJson.additionalMessage);
			} else {
				out.id = autoTaskGr.getValue('sys_id');
				out.number = autoTaskGr.getValue('number');
				out.state = autoTaskGr.getDisplayValue('state');
				out.result = 'ok';
				return out;
			}
		} else {
			return new sn_ws_err.NotFoundError('Could not find Automated Task with id:' + autoTaskId);
		}
		
		
	},
	
	getPathParam: function (paramName) {
        var self = this,
            out = (paramName in self.request.pathParams) ? self.request.pathParams[paramName] : null;
		
		return out;
    },

    type: 'SRAutomatedTaskInbound'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S7DHWK</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-12 07:12:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>e4423b58db7967005a31fd161d961910</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SRAutomatedTaskInbound</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SR Automated task" source="x_swre_auto">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Automated task">6d20a2aedb2567007193f7b31d96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e4423b58db7967005a31fd161d961910</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S7DHWK</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-12-05 07:02:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
